summary: Reflex Reboot of Faendal - Just the changes I\'ve made to him in my own game.
descriptionHtml:
Since I usually mess about with female armor, I thought I\'d try my hand at something male for a change.  This is just a cosmetic change for Faendal...

I\'ve included all the files you\'ll need to avoid any \"grey-face\" issues, so just drop the \"Data\" folder into your \"Skyrim Directory.\"

To uninstall, you\'ll have to go to...
Meshes\\Actors\\Character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\Skyrim.esm, and delete the \"00013480.nif\" file
As well as,
Textures\\Actors\\Character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\Skyrim.esm, and delete BOTH the \"00013480.dds\" file AND the \"00013480.tga\" file.
You\'ll also have to delete the \"RR_Faendal.esp\"

The mods I used for the main image are:
The face \"normal\" comes from \"Handsome Male Elves and Humans by MikoYork,\" and the body \"normal\" is from \"Smooth Male Body  Normal Maps by Urshi.\"

So, check it out if you\'d like, and let me know what I got WRONG... ;-)
author: ReflexShooter
